data.name: Is the weather nice for swimming?
data.description:
Sam wants to go to the beach with his friends. Oh NO!!! Suddenly the whole internet broke in the whole world!!! SAM wanted to see what was the weather!!! But will his plans change or no???

TASK:

Help Sam finiding the weather today!!! You will have a function called weather and an argument temp - as tempreture. Your task is to figure out is the weather good for the beach. 

Hint: 

The tempreture is in celsius!

In Celsius, 5° is cold!
In Celsius, 30° is hot!

The tempreture should be atleast 19 or more!

FIND THE PERFECT(WARM) WEATHER FOR SWIMMING IN THE BEACH!!!

Return True if the weather is nice for swimming else return False!

GOOD LUCK :> !!!
